website_summaries.verdict: Solid quality at a low price.
pros: Durable metal construction & contoured performance for a fraction of the competitor's price
cons: The frame is a bit thin, but our testers didn't notice an effect on performance

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2014 Subaru Forester perfectly. Removing the original ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2014 Subaru Forester perfectly. Removing the original is more straightforward than how the owner's manual explained. There's really nothing to pry. Just lift the arm away from the back window, at this point the blade will point backward. Turn the movable part of the blade counter-clockwise away from the arm until you can turn anymore. Continue to turn counter-clockwise but now you have to use a little strength, yet not being too rough, until you dislodge the whole blade when the small cross-bar in the middle of the blade slides out from the clip on the arm. Now I can see through the back window again. :P
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: As good as oem for Subaru Forester 2017.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Subaru Forester 2017. Fitment: good. Just like OEM. Quality: good. Seems no different than oem. Usage: great. The problem with the OEM wiper was that the outer end of the blade has less contact with the back window than the opposite end, so the outter edge wasn't as clean. But this blade doesn't seems to have that issue at all. Conclusion: based on some of the negative reviews, I was a little worry on the performance of this wiper prior to purchase. But I am glad this has exceeded my expectations. Highly recommended for my vechicle.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and performance, last about a year
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than OEM, can still find it easily online and I consider it good value - I replace it once a year (although my local car wash has a thing for trying to rip it off) and I think mostly it's not wear and tear but damage from pollution that does it in, perhaps if I cleaned it more often itd last longer but who remembers?
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Fits Forte5 rear wiper
customer_reviews.text: I asked the seller if this would fit my rear wiper on a 2016 Kia Forte5, and he said no, but lo and behold, it does! TRICO doesn't list any wiper for the back window of the Forte5, but this one fits perfectly. Be sure you get the Roc Loc mount. So far, I've had it on a week, and it wipes better than new, doesn't hit anything (third brake light), and is overall a better wiper than the one that came on the car. The only difference I can see is the original was a solid piece, where this one is segmented. Speaking for myself, I would recommend this blade for the Forte5 (mine is a 2016).
customer_reviews.author: Gaines E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We used this blade on the rear window of our 2016 Subaru. Taking off the old and putting on the new was easy. The blade lies very flat on the rear window and using the wiper fluid the new blade completely and noiselessly wiped it all off. I originally tried a 14"Trico Flex blade for the rear wiper, but it did not lie flat. Returned it for this blade. This is made for a rear window and worked much better. The Flex blades are on the windshield and they work well there. Overall, very happy with Trico products. Good price and good quality. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: David LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than OEM, but does fit the arm.
customer_reviews.text: The wiper fits but is significantly shorter than the OEM. Since its a rear wiper I am not going to return it but was disappointed that length was not "exact fit". 2" shorter on a 16" wiper is a big deal. When I see it listed as fitting my car and is listed as an exact ft, it really needs to match the original specs.
customer_reviews.author: Puck

customer_reviews.title: NOT The Correct Model #
customer_reviews.text: Either the supply is faulty or this individual package is in error or this package had been opened and reclosed with a incorrect item - any way one looks at it, it is the wrong model. Not close, wrong. The only part of this wiper that is close to correct is the length. The package states <Model 14-B>, the instructions show a <Model 14-B>, the packaging shows the correct 'Roc-Lock 3' type arm fitment - the wiper in this package is not a 14-B and will not fit on a 'Roc-Lock 3' wiper arm. The wiper I received in the 'Roc-Lock 3' package appears to be a 'Roc-Lock 2.'
customer_reviews.author: VN PH CIB TET

customer_reviews.title: Nice good fit on my Subaru Outback (2011)
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels just like the original rear wiper blade on my Subaru Outback (2011). Easy to install/switch out and replace the old one, less than a minute and no tools needed. Hoping it will last as long as the original wiper in the California sun, only time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit 2004 Nissan Murano with curved wiper arm
customer_reviews.text: Despite explicitly stating so, this product will not fit the rear wiper arm of a 2004 Nissan Murano. The rear wiper arm for this model year Murano had a curved wiper arm versus a straight arm used in later model years. The wiper blade is unique in that it uses a system that engages a pin to lock the wiper blade in place once you've slide it onto the mounts in the arm itself. The product shown does not have the requisite slots necessary to slide into place onto the arm. Good thing Amazon has a decent return policy for items not fitting as described!
customer_reviews.author: Jim in VA

customer_reviews.title: NOT Exact Fit
customer_reviews.text: I order this "Exact Fit" replacement wiper blade for my 2015 Toyota Highlander and of course the mounting mechanism wouldn't fit. I ended up taking the rubber wiper out of the wiper assembly and putting that rubber wiper into the original wiper assembly. To me this was easier than dealing with the return. But I'll select another brand of "Exact Fit" next time. Surly there is a manufacturer that actually knows how the wiper assembly is connected to the wiper arm on the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: darrel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, streakless wiping for my Honda Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a snap to install (literally) and has provided me with streakless wiping for the rear window of my Honda Fit. The Fit, like many back windshields, has a bayonet-like snap for these types of blades. Given the reasonable price of these blades, it is a no-brainer to replace them with frequency, especially for the sake of safety.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Yanoff

customer_reviews.title: Was a concerned about fit but had no problem
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to parse through reviews for car accessories because things change from year to year. Some reviewers reported that this product fit, while others reported that it did not. It has the same dimensions as the OEM blade from my 2014 Acura RDX and took ten seconds to replace. If you tried you could do it in under five. Amazon told me that this product would fit, and it did. I have not used it in the rain yet, but it wiped well when I tested it.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee addict

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my rearview wiper that was leaving streaks on my glass. Went to Pep boys to have it properly installed so bad installation is definitely not the problem. Amazingly, it's leaving just as much, of not more streaks than the old one. Unfortunately, I cant return it as there is nothing to replace it with. Old one was thrown away by the person who helped me change it.
customer_reviews.author: Vrykey

customer_reviews.title: Installed on 2008 Honda CR-V LX for the rear wiper.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on 2008 Honda CR-V LX for the rear wiper. Could not find this wiper refill anywhere else but online. I'm glad I found it, since I'm replacing one that is over 8 years old! Direct fit like it says. Snap off the old one and snap in the new one. I compared both old versus new and other than some wear an sun damage on my old one, the parts are identical in every way. I'll remember to buy more of this the next time I need a new refill.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Pictorial instruction a little misleading
customer_reviews.text: It was the first time for me to install a wiper blade and it was easy enough. That is, except I spent inordinate amount of time to figure out what the little extra part was for. As it finally came to me that it was not needed for my Sienna. The pictorial instruction described 3 different wiper arms. But it was printed so small and crowded without any words that was misleading. But the product itself is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: garunner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2007 Honda Fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for am 2007 Honda Fit. It seems to be exactly the same product as the one that was on the car. Removing the old one was very simple, and inserting the new one was even easier.
customer_reviews.author: ors37

customer_reviews.title: This is for a REAR wiper...
customer_reviews.text: Don't think that you will somehow shoehorn this onto a front wiper mount. It only works with the mounts for certain rear wipers. You won't convert it into a 14-inch front wiper. Or you can do as I did and take the rubber off this wiper and replace just the worn-out blade on the wiper you want to replace. But beware, even then, this wiper's blade is of a different width than some--perhaps many--front wipers. Best just to buy this for a rear wiper that you know it will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nebti13

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly on my 2017 Honda Pilot
customer_reviews.text: I went into this replacement with some trepidation; this is the first vehicle I've owned with a rear wiper, and I'd heard horror stories about replacing them. This, however, couldn't have been easier. The Roc Lock fitment is a breeze for both removal and installation, and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Furious

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT upgrade for Xterras
customer_reviews.text: 2nd gen (05-14?) Nissan Xterra has a silly small 12in wiper that is not a STANDARD type wiper. The hook/fastener is this type. This is a straight up replacement that's 2in longer. It doesn't over-hang the top of the glass or get onto the paint. Some people have used 16s, but say that it brushes the paint up top just under the wiper squirter... and I didn't want to risk eventual paint damage.
customer_reviews.author: D. Voo.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well, poor contact with glass
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this blade. It doesn't make good contact with the rear window of my 2011 Forester across approx 1/3 the length of the blade. It streaks significantly even after cleaning and buffing the glass. Also tried giving the blade a good cleaning but no such luck. On a positive note, the wiper looks almost identical to the original equipment and doesn't look out of place or like an aftermarket product.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2004 wrx wagon as stated by amazon garage
customer_reviews.text: Luckily it's cheap cause I really don't feel like driving to ups to send it back. This has a totally different type of mounting than my 2004 subaru wrx wagon however amazon said it would fit and said other blades would not (pretty sure one of them would) - I thought the size was a bit off anyway (14 vs 15). I ordered someplace else.
customer_reviews.author: Gamecat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't perform for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not entirely satisfied with these wipers. I've cleaned the windows real well hoping to get a clear even sweep, but it doesn't performed consistently. It's like it's old before its time.
customer_reviews.author: John of VA

customer_reviews.title: Just like OEM part
customer_reviews.text: Went on just like OEM part. I put it on my Daughters 2018 Honda Fit. Wiper went on with no added adapter parts and very easy. Just tilt the old one out and slip it off, new one went on in reverse order. Took maybe two minutes with no tools. Can not comment on Longevity, just put it on last weekend.
customer_reviews.author: chesches

customer_reviews.title: No Adapter Included?!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying TRICO. The wiper doesn't come with an adapter like every other wiper I have purchased in the past 20 years. This is pretty annoying. I'll just have to go with a brand I know and trust. I cant recommend. I have already returned is because it can be installed. I read a review from someone saying the wiper flopped around and fell off. Now I see how that could happen.
customer_reviews.author: Zef’s reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Not an EXACT fit
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit Honda Pilot. It is missing the plastic "ramp" that lifts the wiper off the rear hatch when not in use. Without it the wiper gets caught under the window when you turn it on. Factory wiper is on the left in the picture
customer_reviews.author: B. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Would not fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this from GARAGE as an exact fit for my vehicle, when I received it first off noticed that it was longer then original, and would not fit wiper arm even if it was the right length. Good news went to AMAZON to return it and they said they would credit my account and to not return item!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but not very well.
customer_reviews.text: This fits our 2008 Subaru Forester just fine, but the wiper is mediocre at best. There are three very distinct pressure points when the blade wipes, and it is rather streaky on the window. We bought some Bosch blades for the front window that work wonderfully, but I went cheaper on the rear blade because it's not used as much. Buy this if you are looking for a cheap blade that will do the trick, but if you really want something that performs well, I suggest looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Fits exactly
customer_reviews.text: This product does just what it purports to do; it fits my 2015 Subaru Forester Limited exactly. The rear wiper seems as well-made as OEM, but as a bonus has a metallic sheen that the original lacked. It installed quickly and easily, and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Nomen Nescio

customer_reviews.title: Fits Rear Windshield of 2005 Subaru Outback
customer_reviews.text: This wiper blade fits the rear wiper arm of my 2005 Subaru Outback LL Bean Edition. The connector is kind of strange, and Walmart doesn't carry wiper blades that fit. Fortunately this one does the trick and works well, too. Not streaky or cheap quality to me.
customer_reviews.author: Evan C

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description do not trust it.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong description and fit to the car. Used item, scratched and returned in open package. If will fit the car will not be an issue because does not looks that was installed in another car. Somebody else had probably the same issue as me. Blade will not match the wiper arm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonunhappy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a ‘16 Forester. Original was not cleaning the outer 2 inches (more of a smear) I thought I’d give this one a try. Fit well During rain it cleared off back window without any smearing Not bad at all. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marty3

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2014 Acura MDX Perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wiper blade fits my 2014 Acura MDX rear wiper blade Perfectly...what more can I ask for?!?! The installation was a snap (literally) and this rear blade actually replicates the stock blade perfectly! This will be my go-to replacement going forward!!!
customer_reviews.author: CommonCents

customer_reviews.title: Car blade
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive anything but the blade. No way to easily switch out the old blade. Description was terrible. Made it sound like you get the blade mount and assembly mounts to attach arm. Even the picture shows metal blade holder.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Schaben

customer_reviews.title: fits Acura RDX, but lower quality than the original
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the rear wiper on my Acura RDX, but the plastic is lower quality and lighter weight. Installed easily and seems to work OK so far. If you replace the whole wiper blade regularly (instead of just the insert), the lower quality plastic may not be a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: l2Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Work well for sure
customer_reviews.text: These are often overlooked since they are in the rear but they are vital to complete the viewing experience. We use ours often to keep them from becoming brittle. Always remember to squirt the windshield washer fluid FIRST.
customer_reviews.author: r2

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Install
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this wiper blade on my car for a few days, so I can't really speak to the quality or effectiveness (it hasn't rained since I put it on); but, the installation took fewer than 30 seconds to complete, so I was happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: not the whole package
customer_reviews.text: The size and shape matched perfectly the rear wiper on my 2008 Honda Fit. Taking the old wiper off was easy...however, while trying to put the new one on, the plastic pins that lock the wiper in place shattered on the installation attempt, as if they were made out of cheese, not plastic...so I ended up taking the rubber insert out of the new wiper, installing the insert on the old wiper, and installing the old wiper with the new insert back on...I'm satisfied with how the new inserts clean the glass but I'm disappointing with the quality of the frame...will probably look into purchasing inserts only in the future...
customer_reviews.author: G. Stankovic

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2013 Subaru Outback perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the original one on my 2013 Subaru Outback. Does a great job of clearing the rear hatch window of frost in the morning and rain during a storm.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin' Fool

customer_reviews.title: Wiper Did not fit 2012 Honda fit
customer_reviews.text: This was my third attempt to get a new rear wiper for a 2012 Honda fit, this does not fit regardless of what the website says, I was able to take the blade out and install it on the factory wiper arm.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This wiper was the perfect fit for the back window of my 2004 Honda Pilot. Easy to install. Exact replica of the factory wiper that was on it. Shipping was extra fast. I would highly recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong, I do use a rear wiper.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I would use a rear wiper that much after we moved, but living out here in the country has proved me wrong if I want to see out. This wiper does a great job, and the view is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Streaky From The Start
customer_reviews.text: This wiper blade looked and installed perfectly. But the blade itself left streaks on the tailgate glass. The streaks were there when the blade was new, and have not "disappeared" as the blade saw more use. This is not a tragedy, but is certainly an annoyance. I'll look for a different brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I went to several stores trying to find a rear wiper blade for my 2015 Honda Fit. Nothing would fit. An amazon customer suggested that I purchase this one because it would fit. I was a little unsure, but I went ahead and bought it and it fits and works perfectly. Also, it was very inexpensive compared to my local stores. I kept the wrapping it came in but I would definitely purchase again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Emereld

customer_reviews.title: Replaced rear and front wipers at same time, but this rear one broke much faster
customer_reviews.text: Replaced rear and front (different brand) wipers at same time, but this rear one broke (the rubber blade was torn apart) much faster and it is used much less frequent than the front wipers.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Working in CO winter
customer_reviews.text: So far they are lasting well. And keeping my window clear in the Colorado winter weather. Only had them a couple of weeks. Will update as the year goes on. Hopefully they will last over a year, as other brands I have gotten only seem to last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Superbeckee

customer_reviews.title: Great OE substitute
customer_reviews.text: Use these as OE replacements on my wife's 2015 MDX. Why buy inserts when these work just as well as the originals, are cheaper than refills, and installs easier. Freaking no brainier. And looks the exact same as the original, even down to the texture on the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Chen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long, started leaving streaks after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits nice and easy, but it didn;t last very long. I bought this in March and it's now November. This started leaving streaks on my rear window a few months ago so it maybe lasted 4 or 5 months before becoming ineffective? Wiper blades should make it longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Pookapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Looks great to me.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 2015 Subaru Forester! Looks pretty much exactly like the factory original that it replaced. Easy to install. Removal & installation Instructions on the packaging included. Appears to be of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: SpiceMan

customer_reviews.title: I wanted this to work, but..
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would work on my vehicle and Amazon said it was compatible, but after a bit of a fight trying to use it, it snapped into two pieces. It is cheap, so I'm not returning it. I think it's a compatibility issue. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Dazednconfused

customer_reviews.title: Works great for honda pilot 2003
customer_reviews.text: Confirming this fits my honda pilot 2003. very easy to snap in (turns out and then pops out - do it gently) and last trico wiper lasted a few years, which is great! Much better price than autoparts store - thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: strick9

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit... but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an OEM blade for my Infinity and this was exactly the same! 1/1/20 About a week ago it started leaving streaks and it’s less than a year old :( Changed my rating from 5 Star to 3.
customer_reviews.author: Cook-N-Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This was an exact match for my 2007 Honda CR-V, easy to install and is still holding up to the weather and working well. Will order again when I need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: USTPC

customer_reviews.title: 5 seconds to install on 2003 Honda Pilot
customer_reviews.text: It took me exactly five seconds to install this on the rear window of a 2003 Honda Pilot. The last time I replaced that wiper blade I had to buy just the floppy rubber strip from a Honda dealer, break a tab off the hard plastic wiper blade frame, fish the old rubber strip out and then fish the new one in. That rubber strip cost more than this whole blade assembly cost and took about ten minutes to install, including figuring out how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit for my Subaru Forester, works great
customer_reviews.text: Local Auto Parts store was out the two times I went by to get a replacement. This is a great wiper and an exact fit. And I did not have to drive anywhere to get it! Can't speak to longevity yet.....
customer_reviews.author: Killihoe

customer_reviews.title: Best fit on my Honda Fit. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2008 honda Fit rear windscreen wiper. It looked like it would fit and Fit it did. It was so easy to get on it seemed like the original . I am of the opinion that this will fit almost all cars with a third wiper rear blade. Worked and working really well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Just received and installed! Easy and helpful video that was offered prior to receiving so I could prepare. Customer support is awesome. Obviously I cannot judge the longevity since I just got it!
customer_reviews.author: E. ODay

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct match for my make and model
customer_reviews.text: This blade was not at all the proper replacement for my Honda Odyssey as Amazon said it would be. I am not sure if Amazon or the retailer is at fault. It's frustrating have to deal with this.
customer_reviews.author: Deana J Harrison

customer_reviews.title: '09 Forester - Exact fit and minimal streaking
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think it would be hard to shop for a rear blade for my 2009 Subaru Forester. Read a ton of reviews and settled on this one. Snapped right on and it was a perfect fit. Streaked for a drive or two while in use, but now I think it's broken in and is perfect. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Baraka

customer_reviews.title: It’s a rear wiper. It solved my problem
customer_reviews.text: Old wiper finally fell apart and had to buy a new one. Blade was super easy to install once you know the trick. Just search youtube. No streaks. No squeaks. Works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: John Bugajski

customer_reviews.title: It will not work
customer_reviews.text: Nice blade but will not work on 2006 Sienna Van rear wiper, the wiper arm is made differently than what shown on Trico package This was brought as package deal two front wiper blades, cabin filter,and a rear wiper blade
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Keep buying.
customer_reviews.text: This is about the third time I'm buying these wipers, they last little over a year, which really good. And they're perfect fit for my mom's. 2011 Honda Fit
customer_reviews.author: Ivan R.

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit 2005 Honda Odyssey
customer_reviews.text: The openings, that go onto the vehicle's wiper arm holder, were much smaller than the picture of the product on Amazon. Wasn't able to use the blade, but I gently pulled the wiper out of it and put it into the blade that held the old worn out wiper. Seems to work ok, but I won't purchase this again. Will purchase the Bocsh wiper in the future. A few more $'s but a better product.
customer_reviews.author: J & N

customer_reviews.title: Solid value and good performance.
customer_reviews.text: I got 20 months of life out of my first one of these so I'm happy to purchase another one. The blade is a perfect fit for the rear wiper on my 2008 Acura RDX and it handled plenty of grime, snow, and heavy rain quite well over its lifespan. Good price + decent service life = solid value in my book.
customer_reviews.author: AlBSure

customer_reviews.title: 2015 Subaru Outback. Fits.
customer_reviews.text: 2015 Subaru Outback 2.5i rear blade perfect fit. Works great, affordable and didn't have to go to the store to get. If it falls apart in 2 months I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Gosse

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fits my honda fit2012 perfectly. It was a little bit of a pain to put it on but I am not used to attaching & reattaching those kinds of things so that may have been it. But it works wonderfully and does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 2016 Outback
customer_reviews.text: Easy install on my 2016 Subaru Outback and performs like the original one did before it ripped. Great quality and a fraction of the price of what the auto parts store wanted
customer_reviews.author: Caveman017

customer_reviews.title: Longevity is great
customer_reviews.text: Lasted at least 5 months before I decided to replace, and we've been getting a lot of rain here on the east coast this year. Does a great job as a rear wiper for a 2016 Honda fit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Langowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement blade for my 2015 Subaru Forester. This rear-window blade is had to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding replacement blade
customer_reviews.text: Theis an excellent replacement blade for the back wiper on my 2007 Acura RDX. There are instructions included in the package that detail how to remove the old blade (it requires a slightly unnatural movement, bending the blade more than 90 degrees to allow it to pop out - the instructions were definitely helpful). I followed the documentation again for installation of the new piece and it has the look and feel of the old. I can't tell the difference, to be honest, save the fact that the new one works like a new blade. Very pleased with the quality and appearance of this item as a near exact replacement for my existing stock rear wiper. Five stars, no question.
customer_reviews.author: K Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously difficult to install & did not come with instructions - I usually get rainex and it only takes 2 minutes at most to install. It took 30 minutes to install this kind, because the snap piece would not budge open or closed right away.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This rear wiper for my 2006 Honda Pilot EX-L fit ...
customer_reviews.text: This rear wiper for my 2006 Honda Pilot EX-L fit exactly as it is described. The wiper assembly is made from plastic vice the metal you get from Honda Parts Dealer but also dosen't cost $20 plus either.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Within 9 months, one end started to detach and one month later, 1/3 of the entire blade is now flopping around. Not even used that much.
customer_reviews.author: MoreBikes

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it should do....mow my lawn. Just kidding!
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s a wiper blade. I installed it, and it wiped rained off my rear window in an efficient manner. Great! 5 stars! We’ll see how long it will be effective before it starts to leave streaks.
customer_reviews.author: towelmaster

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately it didn't fit so I did a diy but still works great just the wiper doesn't look like it will last ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to do a diy in this situation because it didn't actually fit my Jeep Liberty. I needed a 12 in but bought 14. I mean why not clear more area, unfortunately it didn't fit so I did a diy but still works great just the wiper doesn't look like it will last for a long time. I feel like it's cheap plastic. I would go with Bosch next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for hard to find item.
customer_reviews.text: I heard so many nightmares about how difficult installing a wiper on the rear window for a 2007 murano was. Many people take it to the dealership and they charge anywhere from $30-$80 for parts and labor on replacing rear wiper blade. i read the review and instructions by By J. Powers "Jess" here on Amazon and those were a god send. the directions were exactly correct. WOuld highly recommend this item for quality and price, but also use "J. Powers "Jess" review to install on nissan murano.
customer_reviews.author: JohnM.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the 2004 Subaru Forester Xt, should fit other years too. These vehicles use a different wiper than normal, I tried 2 others from an online Auto Parts store and they were both incorrect, glad I found this one on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cody W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find this size/type anywhere and thought I was going to have to buy through a dealership! This was a perfect fit and has been working without any issue for months. Glad I double-checked Amazon before paying probably twice as much from a dealership!
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: Hard af to snap in place
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 2003 Nissan Murano. It was difficult to snap in. Looks like it fit but we'll see how it does when i need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel V

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement blade
customer_reviews.text: I traded in my car and gave the new vehicle to my wife and took her '08 CR-V. I'd neglected the little things on it and had never changed the rear blade (6 model years) so it was getting a bit raggedy - still hanging in there, but not doing a great job. When I removed the old one, the rubber blade part easily pulled away from the support rubber so I think I got to it just in time. Super-easy, quick installation and this seems like a quality product. Cleaned the rear window perfectly in the snow, rain and when using the squirters. Just hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Not an "Exact Fit"
customer_reviews.text: This is not an "Exact Fit" for the rear of my 2013 Honda Pilot. The stock wiper has a little bracket to sit into a cradle when the wiper is not in use. This one was the right size and connector, but no bracket. I checked, it is not removable, it is molded into the plastic of the wiper. I pulled the rubber out of the new one and stuck it into the old wiper to make it work, but not really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GDCFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to install. For rear wiper
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fit perfectly for two of our cars, 2017 Honda Pilot and 2015 Subaru Forester. This is for rear wipers. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year in and Still Perfect on my 2008 Subaru Hatchback!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Rear Wiper Blade! Fit perfectly on my 2008 Subaru Impreza 2.5i Hatchback. Very easy to install. Have lasted over a year now!
customer_reviews.author: S13 HB

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible and not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit my car at all despite the description saying it supposedly did. Not sure where this lock pattern is from but it is not right. It also fell apart too. Not a good product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Evangelides

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for the original rear wiper.
customer_reviews.text: Questions asked are not relevant and therfore gave 1 star. The fact is the wiper was very easy to install and works great. Noise level and longevity not applicable.
customer_reviews.author: Ed John

customer_reviews.title: Great wiper
customer_reviews.text: It's a great rear wiper that makes strong contact with the window, and the blade holds up against bad weather and ice.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit—perfect, exact fit. Top quality.
customer_reviews.text: After struggling with other rear wiper blade replacements (which usually end in taking apart the old rear wiper and using just the rhin rubber part from the new wiper), I tried this one. Finally, a product that lives up to its name. Our of the box onto the car in 39 seconds. It was an exact fit and looked like the original Honda rear wiper.
customer_reviews.author: hotelpilot

customer_reviews.title: Not without a hitch
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, I knew this fit my 2008 Honda Fit. I had no trouble removing the old assembly and getting the new one into position for locking in. However, the two plastic nubs that match up with the grooves on the wiper arm both broke off when I was snapping the new assembly into place. I know Everything was lined up perfectly, because I had to remove the broken pieces from the grooves. Fortunately, I was able to remove the blade itself and wriggle it into the old assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Nohohos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2009 Honda Fit Sport
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2009 Honda Fit Sport perfect. Super easy install. Has worked well in rain, freezing rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Worth the money. Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've never changed a wiper blade before in my life and I'm 39. This rear wiper was straight forward and easy to install on my Odyssey.
customer_reviews.author: Brookie Q.

customer_reviews.title: Nope wipe on the back 😁
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturers wiper on the back of our Subaru was terrible. I bought this and was pleasantly surprised it worked better than stock wipers.
customer_reviews.author: UpState NYer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received this wiper blade for my Impreza while it was better than the one that was on for the last year which was falling apart, it was not much better. Immediately the wiper was missing spots and was streaking. Looked to make sure nothing was trapped underneath the wiper it was completely clear but looked like they sent me one that was damaged. I would think twice about buying this but there aren’t many other options to buy this size wiper blade.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pezzo

customer_reviews.title: Easy install on Honda Fit
customer_reviews.text: Worked with my 2017 Honda Fit. Clears the water away well. Installation took about a minute. Follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nissan efford it up
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick, product was an exact fit. I'd recommend again. Nissan really messed up this design. You have to pull off the entire arm to get the replacement blade on. Check out you tube for pulling off the wiper arm it's relatively easy if you're comfortable with doing this type of work.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzaro

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Take seconds and it's done. Works well for the rear window in my 2010 CRV.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on 2013 Subaru Forester
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a direct OEM replacement for the rear wiper on my 2013 Subaru Forester. It looks identical to the factory wiper blade which I just replaced after 3.5 years. If this wiper blade works as well as the original, I will have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KateN

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Fit....
customer_reviews.text: 2010 Honda Fit rear wiper blade. Easy to replace the old wiper blade. Works well. Good price. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Fits my wife's 2010 Subaru Forester well. Very easy to install. Works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2015 Subaru Forester perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried since my Subaru rear wiper has a unique snap-in mounting, but this did fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit Subaru as advertised. However, easily fixed with return through customer service.
customer_reviews.author: kar78756

customer_reviews.title: Good wiper blade
customer_reviews.text: All as promised. Good OEM wiper. Delivery took a bit longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TRICO Exact Fit 14-B Rear Integral Wiper Blade - 14 Inch
product_meta.description: TRICO Exact Fit rear wiper blades make it easy to restore your vehicle to original factory quality. Precisely designed to provide the best fit and critical rear visibility.
feature_bullets: This Exact Fit rear wiper blade fits the Roc Loc 3 arm
Pre-assembled to precisely match vehicles specific arm type
Exact O.E. appearance for domestic and import vehicles. One step installation, installs in seconds
These refills are manufactured to fit the original equipment wiper assembly, If this assembly has been replaced with anything other than an OE product the refill may not fit properly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,945 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
